1.title: The Afro Gypsy
1.subtitle: I create jewelry and accessories that enhance the uniqueness of you; we like to call it Bohemian with an AFRO-tude! My work predominantly consist of leather and metalwork items. But, considering my love for the extraordinary, you may stumble upon many other new or vintage items that could steal your heart!

products.name: Unisex African Bead Bracelets paired with Lava or Wood Beads
products.description: African Bead Bracelets paired with Lava or Wood Beads. Sultry and handsome, these bracelets are all hand made with stretch cord.

products.name: Handmade Journal
products.description: Handmade journal covered in luxurious upcycled upholstery with a hand sewn leather trim. This 96-page journal is ready to hold your secrets and hear your dreams. 3.75" w × 6.7" h.

products.name: Large Amethyst Pendant Necklace
products.description: Hand wired Large Amethyst pendant necklace with 14K Antiqued GP chain and findings.

1.title: POWERHANDZ
1.subtitle: POWERHANDZ is a global company that manufactures unique skill development products used by thousands of professional and youth athletes in multiple sports.

products.name: Basketball Gift Set
products.description: Set includes POWERHANDZ Gloves, DribbleSleeve, Wristband, and Bag

products.name: Football Gift Set
products.description: Set includes POWERHANDZ Gloves, Wristband, and Bag.

products.name: POWERHANDZ Resistance Bands and Sliders
products.description: Set includes 5 resistance bands, 2 sliding disks, and a bag for storage.

2.title: The Bail Project
2.subtitle: The Bail Project™ National Revolving Bail Fund is on a mission to combat mass incarceration and reshape the pretrial system in the United States. 100% of online donations are used to bring people home. Since bail money comes back to us when cases close, we're able to recycle every dollar donated at least twice per year.

2.title: How we're priming some kids for college — and others for prison
2.subtitle: In the United States, two institutions guide teenagers on the journey to adulthood: college and prison. Sociologist Alice Goffman spent six years in a troubled Philadelphia neighborhood and saw first-hand how teenagers of African-American and Latino backgrounds are funneled down the path to prison — sometimes starting with relatively minor infractions. In an impassioned talk she asks, "Why are we offering only handcuffs and jail time?"

3.title: Derek Chauvin Is Sentenced To 22 1/2 Years For George Floyd's Murder
3.subtitle: A Minnesota judge sentenced Derek Chauvin to 22 1/2 years in prison for the murder of George Floyd — a punishment that exceeds the state's minimum guidelines but falls short of prosecutors' request of a 30-year sentence.

3.title: What Happened on May 25th?
3.subtitle: On May 25th, 2020, George Floyd was in Minneapolis on business, far from his family and community, when four Minneapolis police officers murdered him in broad daylight. It was a modern day lynching as those police officers served as judge, jury, and executioner on an unarmed, non-violent, handcuffed Black man.

4.title: Justice for the Murder of Rayshard Brooks
4.subtitle: Rayshard Brooks, an unarmed, 27 year old Black man was murdered after 3 officers responded to complaints of him sleeping in his vehicle in the Wendy’s parking lot. After struggling with the officers, Brooks began to run for his life, when he was shot in the back more than once.

4.title: Bedroom Kandi
4.subtitle: Welcome to Bedroom Kandi, where women, men, and their partners can pamper themselves with intimate luxury! At Bedroom Kandi, our mission is to destigmatize intimacy and self-love, promote sexual wellness and education, and empower entrepreneurs to find success and happiness in the business of pleasure.

5.title: Kids Swag
5.subtitle: Great action is taking place to improve diversity in books and dolls and there are a number of different vendors making it easier to find these great items. But what about everything else in your child's world? You go grocery shopping, what image is on the cute plate and cup set your child wants? You're want to encourage their creativity, what images are in their colouring books? You're throwing a birthday party, what are your options?
5.moreInfo: The list can go on and on. It is an unnecessarily complicated task to source and purchase everyday lifestyle products for children that have black images. These companies exist but one must be internet savvy and social media literate to find them. KIDS SWAG was launched in December 2016 to make it easy for parents to build environments that are reflective of their child's beauty.

products.name: Nia Ballerina Backpack
products.description: This beautifully illustrated pink rucksack is the perfect accessory for your little ballerina, which is both lightweight and practical with plenty of storage. Made from durable and water-resistant material this rucksack features a colourful design with two images of Nia Ballerina on the front.

products.name: Nana Yaa
products.description: Nana means Queen or King in West Africa , Ghana. The founders of Nana Dolls wanted to teach the younger generation of their history whilst also having fun. There were many strong courageous women from all over Africa who helped to fight for freedom.

products.name: Super Friends Onesie
products.description: Your little Superhero featured as your favourite Superhero.

5.title: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.
5.subtitle: We carry grooming products that are primarily geared towards the bearded community, but we also have women and children using them as well. Our oil, balm, and butter are excellent for the hair on your head, and the butter can also double as a lotion.

products.name: Tanzanian Sun Premium Beard Butter
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard butter is designed to feel more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard. Soothes and replenishes dry, damaged hair with natural lipid-rich botanicals. Adds the finishing touches for beard renewal and restoration.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: Premium Classic Beard Oil
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard oil is designed to tone, nourish, and clear the skin underneath the beard. It feels more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: GL Long Sleeve Shirts
products.description: This well-loved favorite features a classic crew neck, long sleeves, and superior combed and ring-spun jersey cotton. Solid colors are made from 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz, while Athletic Heather is made from 90% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton and 10% poly blend.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

6.title: Golde
6.subtitle: We're on a mission to make wellness easy, accessible and fun for all. To us, self-care means feeling like your best self. We believe that being well should feel good. That means products that fit seamlessly into your lifestyle, not the other way around.

products.name: Pure Matcha
products.description: Enjoy the ultimate green superfood in its purest form: matcha, made with 100% pure, shade-grown green tea leaves from Uji, Japan.

products.name: Papaya Bright Face Mask
products.description: This brightening mask is made with 100% pure, edible superfoods. Featuring superfruits like lucuma, papaya, and sea buckthorn berry, it's packed with vitamin C and smells like a tropical vacation.

products.name: Skin Hydration Ade
products.description: Sip + glow to support skin hydration with the power of superfoods.

6.title: D'Lashes
6.subtitle: Take your eyelashes from thin unnoticeable eyelashes to rich, full, beautiful ones. Dionne’s Lashes are custom individual eyelash extensions that are attached to your natural eyelashes, lasting up to 6-8 weeks.

products.name: D'Ultra Matte Lipstick
products.description: You want Luxurious, creamy lipstick with a modern matte finish? Well, this Matte Lipstick Delivers saturated color, intense hydration and extended wear, for soft, smooth, beautiful lips. Just enough "Pop" to go with your D'Lashes!

products.name: D'Luscious
products.description: Be bold and rock a standout look with a little help from the D’Luscious lashes. These dark strip lashes open and enhance your eyes by creating a fuller, thicker lash look.

products.name: Black Luxury Edition Candle
products.description: This New D'Lashes Black Luxury Candle is the convergence of artistic souls who share a singular desire to create. Free of constraint and compromise. Fusing years of experience in the world of Beauty and Eyelashes.

7.title: The Nile List
7.subtitle: Nile is a digital community that connects consumers with Black-owned brands online. Think of Nile as your one-stop-shop for Black brands. All you have to do is think of what you want to buy online and we will show you somebody Black who makes that!

7.title: Ashay by the Bay
7.subtitle: We are an Independent Minority Owned Business and Deborah Day is the Founder and CEO. She opened the business in 2000 and started selling books online in 2002, establishing Ashay by the Bay as a Book Reseller that Specializes in African American and Multi-Cultural Children’s Books, Baby-3 and K-12 for Schools and Organizations.  We sell a Diverse Selection of books to both the Consumer and Business Markets and we Build Custom Collections for School and Classroom Libraries.  We also sell Gift Cards provide and we are the publishers of the Mindful Messages Curriculum.  Our home office is located in Vallejo, California. and we sell books throughout the US, Canada and select Markets around the world.

8.title: Eb + Flo Boutique
8.subtitle: Eb and Flo started out as just a vision and manifested in 2020. Our CEO, Ebony Hunter, is a strong believer in living out your dreams while not only looking good but feeling good too. Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Classic Boss Lady Track Suit
products.description: Chic track suit for the lady on the go. Throw it on for a quick trip to the grocery store, a nail appointment, or dress it up for a cute brunch look.

products.name: Tedy Soft Sherpa Jacket
products.description: The warmest and most comfortable jacket you'll ever own! The Teddy Sherpa Jacket feels like a warm hug or like you're wearing a blanket. Features a drawstring hem that allows you to snatch that waist hunny *snap*snap*

products.name: "Thou shall not try me" T-Shirt
products.description: Mood 24:7! Let the folks know the deal in this super soft tee.

8.title: Open a random campaign to donate to
8.subtitle: Take the effort of decision out of it — tap here and we'll select a random campaign for you to support!

9.title: My Beautiful Fluff
9.subtitle: Clothes designed with curves in mind. Each shirt is cut to accommodate curves and fluff with custom to cut to my size chart with sizes L to 5XL.

9.title: Fight for Breonna
9.subtitle: Breonna survived the frontlines of a pandemic that disproportionately kills Black people, only to have her life stolen by police. Take Action.

10.title: How students of color confront impostor syndrome
10.subtitle: As a black woman from a tough part of the Bronx who grew up to attain all the markers of academic prestige, Dena Simmons knows that for students of color, success in school sometimes comes at the cost of living authentically. Now an educator herself, Simmons discusses how we might create a classroom that makes all students feel proud of who they are.

10.title: VZN Clothing
10.subtitle: Our clothing is made to motivate you to visualize your goals and remain persistent through adversity. Vision is not simply seeing with the eyes, but rather creating a positive image and experience for your future success with your mind. By following your vision with action and remaining persistent through adversity, we believe anything is possible.

products.name: Spread Love, Not Germs Heart Mask
products.description: Black mask with red and white embroidery

products.name: Tre Balloon Series 1.0 Tee
products.description: For the Tre Series, we follow the boy, Tre, on his path of following his dreams. The purpose of Tre being lifted by the balloons while holding the basketball is to inspire people to work towards their goals with the confidence of a child who is following their dreams.

products.name: Memory Lane Poster Print
products.description: 8 x 11 in 80 lb paper Oil painting print with a matte finish

11.title: Donating Tip
11.subtitle: Maximize your impact by making smaller, monthly donations to a few different organizations.
11.info: Don't just let your donations be a one-time lump sum donation. Instead, spread the love out with smaller, recurring, monthly donations to continue supporting the movement beyond your first donation.

11.title: John Hope - Biography
11.subtitle: John Hope was an important African American educator and race leader of the early twentieth century. In 1906 he became the first Black president of Morehouse College—the alma mater of Martin Luther King Jr.—in Atlanta.

12.title: BLK & Bold
12.subtitle: BLK & Bold welcomes the obligation to equip young people with tools to live their best lives and overcome familiar unfortunate circumstances by turning a daily ritual, enjoying a cup of coffee & tea, into a means of giving back. BLK & Bold pledges 5% of its profits to initiatives aligned to sustaining youth programming, enhancing workforce development, and eradicating youth homelessness.

products.name: La Guadalupe, Honduras - Single Origin (Direct Trade), Light Roast
products.description: As these beans are directly sourced from Finca La Guadalupe, this single origin will satisfy your desire for a creamy bodied light roast. With undertones of caramel and honey, this will become your everyday coffee.

products.name: Jasmine Loose Leaf Green Tea
products.description: Satisfy both smell and taste with this Jasmine Tea! Lightly smooth & sweet, it contains green tea leaves absorbed with fragrance from jasmine petals. This produces a cup that is very sensual with floral aromatics

products.name: BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hats
products.description: 2020 BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hat. Black/White/Yellow

12.title: Two more cis Black women banned from Olympics for their natural testosterone levels
12.subtitle: Christine Mboma and Beatrice Masilingi are the latest accomplished athletes to be excluded under the rule that devastated Caster Semenya's career.

13.title: Tell Congress to Support the MORE Act (H.R. 3884/S. 2227)
13.subtitle: We believe in cannabis legalization, but only if it’s got justice baked right in. Even with more and more states saying yes to legal cannabis, hundreds of thousands of people are still being arrested every year, most of them for possession—and they are disproportionately Black. It doesn’t have to be that way. With your help we can legalize cannabis while expunging prior cannabis convictions, and make 4/20 a day we all can celebrate.

13.title: 10 killed in "racially motivated" mass shooting at Buffalo supermarket
13.subtitle: Police said the shooter has been charged with murder in what officials are calling a hate crime and a case of racially motivated violent extremism.

14.title: Kultured Misfits
14.subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)
products.description: Classic Kultured Misfits tracksuIt set with matching crewneck and jogger pants in black. A comfortable cotton mix jogger, featuring embroidered Kultured Misfits logo on the left chest and thigh. Drawstring waist and cuffed hems.

products.name: Legalize Free College (Do Tha Right Thang) T-Shirt
products.description: Every sale of a Legalize Free College product will contribute to the "Legalize Free College Scholarship"!

products.name: MISFIT Embossed Crewneck
products.description: Premium crewneck is cut from French terry jersey. With the embossed cursive logo adds a signature finishing touch to its classic design.

14.title: What If I Don't Move to the Back of the Bus?
14.subtitle: Rosa Parks brought together a unique blend of life experiences, a commitment to racial justice, and a flawless reputation to transform a single act of defiance into a defining moment for the modern American civil rights movement.

15.title: 360 Magazine
15.subtitle:
360 is an edgy fashion, lifestyle and culture magazine. We will introduce cutting-edge brands, entities and trends to tastemakers within their respective communities. Our founding members have over 30 years of collective experience both as notable talent and uber professionals within the realm of fashion, music, art, design and entertainment. We are more than just a magazine comprised of journalists, representing a movement of social awareness and change.

We are a LGBTQIA friendly publication. The magazine is contemporary in look and appeal. Quality art content is the constant goal. The magazine will be entertaining, newsworthy and thought-provoking. It will appeal to a broad entertainment readership. No magazine like it is available today, constantly celebrating racial and sexual ambiguous talent and artists.

15.title: Frederick Douglass
15.subtitle: Frederick Douglass was an escaped slave who became a prominent activist, author and public speaker.

16.title: Double Dutch Dolls
16.subtitle: Through Fashion and Fun encourage young girls to explore and appreciate each other’s differences and similarities. Beauty comes in all shades and the brand seeks to create a community that celebrates the multicultural beauty of every child.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Zaria Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Zaria Bradley. I am Kaila’s levelheaded, laidback twin-sister. My personal style is "classic cool". I’m into Soccer, Science, and keeping Kaila out of trouble, which is a huge job. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school. I am Captain of the Stingrays soccer team, President of the Science Club. I’ve got my future all planned out with a soccer scholarship, HBCU undergrad and med school.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Kaila Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Kaila Bradley and I love fashion. I am the creative mind behind the Double Dutch Dolls hip style. A budding fashionista, I design all of our clothes and have plans to launch my own fashion line, named none other than "Double Dutch Dolls" in honor of me and my also fabulous sister, Zaria. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school and Co-captain of the Stingrays Cheerleading team.

products.name: Double Dutch Dolls Book 1- "Double Dare"
products.description: Navigating middle school can be tricky. But, 14-year old twins Kaila and Zaria Bradley, known to everyone as the Double Dutch Dolls, seem to have it all figured out.

16.title: Does racism affect how you vote?
16.subtitle: Nate Silver has data that answers big questions about race in politics. For instance, in the 2008 presidential race, did Obama's skin color actually keep him from getting votes in some parts of the country? Stats and myths collide in this fascinating talk that ends with a remarkable insight.

17.title: As I Am
17.subtitle: As I Am hair is a natural hair care brand. It markets unique and exclusively formulated hair products. It consists of 11 products designed for tightly coiled hair made from the finest organic ingredients. The line then became a quick success.

products.name: Coconut CoWash 16 oz
products.description: You already know it and your hair can feel it! CoWashing is the way to cleanse your hair most of the time. This light no-suds conditioning cream gently removes residue including all of the things you've used to style and maintain your coils and curls. Now it's time for a sparkling new beginning.

products.name: Coils & Curls Care Package
products.description: Experience the superb performance of As I Am® products with this economical starter set. Designed to nurture and style the texture that’s naturally yours.

products.name: Moisturizing Hand Sanitizer
products.description: Kills 99.99% Of All Common Germs. Eliminates Bacteria On Skin. Anti Microbial. Contains 62% Ethyl Alcohol. Fragrance Free. Unscented. Enriched with Aloe Vera, Betaine, and Glycerin. 73% Increase in Skin Hydration. This Gentle formula Improves Skin Health by 41%

17.title: Justice for Tete Gulley
17.subtitle: Tete Gulley was a 31 year old queer Black transient. She was also known by some of her family as Otis. She was found hanging from a tree on the evening of May 27th 2019 in Rocky Butte Park. The cause of death was determined to be suicide at the scene but there is evidence of foul play.

18.title: The RACE Method Of Talking To A Racism Skeptic
18.subtitle: The RACE Method is an approach that anti-racism allies can take to trying to share their perspective with people who are skeptical that racism against people of color is a problem worthy of specific attention. It is based on principles from non-violent communication and on findings from the science of persuasion.

18.title: Diarrablu
18.subtitle: The Diarrablu mission is to iterate for sustainability while highlighting the African continent’s rich colors and unique patterns through practical and versatile pieces designed using mathematical concepts or algorithms.

products.name: Sustainable Mailys Dress - Noir
products.description: Sustainable, artisanal and size inclusive, the Mailys Dress is easily convertible into over 19 different styles. This garment is a comfortable and versatile dress thoughtfully designed to fit all body shapes and sizes.

products.name: Headwrap - Suto
products.description: These statement pieces are part of our zero-waste sustainable approach as we believe in maximizing the usage of all our fabrics.

products.name: Hidden in Ocho Rios | Art Print
products.description: In this piece, we daydream of an impromptu retreat in Ocho Rios, Jamaica in a hidden tree-house covered in palm leaves.

19.title: Ruth Nathan's
19.subtitle: It is Nicole R. Brown's desire that Ruth Nathan’s does not only make customers look spectacular but feel spectacular as well, positively influencing them to feel better about themselves. It is a known fact that when one dresses well, one feels better—and from an outfit that is well put together, that makes one walk with pride, the Urban Peacock emerges.

products.name: Blue Curved Mask
products.description: Still want to look dapper while protecting yourself and others? We have the answer! Reusable and re-washable, these fabric masks will keep you looking good and doing good. When you buy a curved face mask from Ruth Nathan’s we donate a rectangular face mask to health care professionals and essential workers in need.

products.name: Franc Bleu Bow Tie
products.description: The deep older brother of the Franc Un pattern, the Franc Bleu’s watercolor pen lines convey elegance and a truly historic sense of style. Also inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Bleu carries notes of art deco, dancing under the stars, and midnight.

products.name: Franc Un Pocket Square
products.description: Inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Un pattern gives off a refined yet playful vibe sure to elevate your look during formal occasions. Perfect for when you want to be taken seriously—but not too seriously. Notes of Art Deco, French Quarter jazz, and pistachios.

19.title: Vera Institute of Justice
19.subtitle: Vera is powered by hundreds of advocates, researchers, and activists working to transform the criminal legal and immigration systems until they’re fair for all. Founded in 1961 to advocate for alternatives to money bail in New York City, Vera is now a national organization that partners with impacted communities and government leaders for change.

20.title: The Hate U Give
20.subtitle: Based on the best-selling novel, The Hate U Give tells the story of Starr Carter, who lives in two worlds: the poor, black neighborhood where she resides and the mostly white prep school she attends. This uneasy balance is shattered when she witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood friend by a policeman. Facing pressures from all sides, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what’s right.

20.title: United Negro College Fund
20.subtitle: UNCF envisions a nation where all Americans have equal access to a college education that prepares them for rich intellectual lives, competitive and fulfilling careers, engaged citizenship and service to our nation.

21.title: Celebrating 10 African-American medical pioneers
21.subtitle: These trailblazers broke barriers and shattered stereotypes — and went on to conduct research, discover treatments, and provide leadership that improved the health of millions.

21.title: Find Your Representatives
21.subtitle: Here you can find your representatives, how to contact them, bills they’ve introduced, committees they serve on, and political contributions they’ve received.

22.title: Center for Policing Equity
22.subtitle: Your donation fuels our ability to lead on the police reform that's necessary. Together we will create a public safety system that protects and preserves justice for all.

22.title: How we're honoring people overlooked by history
22.subtitle: Since its founding in 1851, the "New York Times" has published thousands of obituaries — for heads of state, famous celebrities, even the inventor of the sock puppet. But only a small percentage of them chronicle the lives of women and people of color. In this insightful talk, "Times" editor Amy Padnani shares the story behind "Overlooked," the project she's leading to recognize people from history whose deaths were ignored — and refocus society's lens on who is considered important.

23.title: BLK & Proud Forever
23.subtitle: BLK & Proud Forever was started in 2019 for a family that was in need of some custom apparel that could display their Black pride. Our goal is to provide some great BLK&Proud gear that supports, celebrates and amplifies the dopeness in being Blackity Black Black 365.

23.title: How the Dodgers 'Took' Jackie Robinson | Field of Dreams...Deferred Part 3
23.subtitle: Brooklyn Dodgers executive Branch Rickey signed Jackie Robinson from the Kansas City Monarchs in 1945, but he refused to pay Negro League teams for their players. Watch more on the fight to integrate MLB in "Field of Dreams...Deferred" Part 3.

24.title: Nia the Loc God
24.subtitle: A natural oil that your hair will love. You are one step closer to moisturized, shiny, healthy hair that smells amazing.

products.name: Loc God Stimulating Oil 4oz
products.description: This stimulating oils is the perfect item to add to your haircare routine. 100% natural, also smells 100% like lemongrass essential oils.  This product is extremely light and will leave your scalp itch free.

products.name: The Loc God Hydration Mist 9oz
products.description: This hydration mist is the perfect item to add to your haircare routine. 100% natural, also smells 100% like lavender essential oils.  This product will leave your hair super soft and give you an extra boost of hydration and shine.

products.name: The Loc God Scalp Renewal Cleansing Shampoo (Lemongrass)
products.description: Deep cleansing shampoo, with a luxurious smell that will leave your hair clean and not feeling stripped. This shampoo is 100% natural. It will help with dandruff, irritated and or itchy scalp.

24.title: Hiram Rhodes Revels - Biography
24.subtitle: A freeman his entire life, Hiram Rhodes Revels was the first African American to serve in the U.S. Congress. With his moderate political orientation and oratorical skills honed from years as a preacher, Revels filled a vacant seat in the United States Senate in 1870.

25.title: Savor Seasoning Blends
25.subtitle: Savor Seasonings blends are handcrafted creations by the Spencer family; Dulani, Lisa and Myles.

products.name: Rubbed: Honey, It's BBQ
products.description: A honey based rub for your ribs, ham salmon. The honey base will give your meats a nice crispy, caramel crust.

products.name: Truffle Butter
products.description: Sweet cream butter, blended with Italian black truffles and truffle salt. Your potatoes, beef, pork, veggies, sourdough bread, pasta, seafood, rice and your tummy will thank you!

products.name: Vampire Salt (6oz Grinder)
products.description: A blend of garlic cloves and sea salt. It's just that simple. Try it on everything; soups, sauces, poultry, pork, beef, mashed potatoes, veggies.

25.title: Controversy over Confederate monuments is overdue
25.subtitle: As Confederate monuments and memorials are toppled across the United States, Stanford historian James T. Campbell says it is important to think historically not only about the past but also about our own time and what future generations might say about us.

26.title: Code Switch Podcast
26.subtitle: Hosted by journalists of color, our podcast tackles the subject of race head-on. We explore how it impacts every part of society — from politics and pop culture to history, sports and everything in between. This podcast makes ALL OF US part of the conversation — because we're all part of the story.

26.title: Racial Literacy: A Call to Action for Teachers
26.subtitle: Uprisings in the wake of George Floyd’s death at the hands of police and the worldwide reaction demanding racial justice represented a wake-up moment for schools. Talking about race will be essential if we are going to serve all students well.

27.title: Mass Incarceration: Visualized
27.subtitle: Concrete actions, more than stated beliefs, are a true reflection of values, both personal and societal. We may claim to value human life, but our societal actions and policies say otherwise.

27.title: The Honey Pot Company
27.subtitle: Stay clean, fresh, and balanced, even during your period with our natural menstrual products. Banish bacteria and cramps with herbal-infused, chemical-free sanitary pads and tampons that create a "cooling" effect that’s both protective and soothing.

products.name: Menstrual Cup
products.description: If tampons or pads aren't your "cup" of tea, reach for the Honey Pot Co Menstrual Cup: a convenient, sustainable alternative that's good for you and the earth.

products.name: Mommy-to-Be Wash
products.description: Use our feminine hygiene wash during pregnancy to balance your pH, fight odor-causing bacteria, and calm discomfort while gently cleansing your honeypot.

products.name: Soothing Body Balm
products.description: This body salve is infused with natural magnesium for menstrual cramps and 500 mg of broad-spectrum hemp distillate. This hemp and magnesium body balm does not contain THC.

28.title: What Anti-racist Teachers Do Differently
28.subtitle: They view the success of black students as central to the success of their own teaching. Read more from Pirette McKamey, principal of San Francisco’s Mission High School and an anti-racist educator for more than 30 years.

28.title: "I Have A Dream" Speech, In Its Entirety
28.subtitle: Listen to Martin Luther King, Jr.'s "I Have a Dream" speech.

29.title: Toni Morrison - Biography
29.subtitle: Toni Morrison was a Nobel and Pulitzer Prize-winning American novelist. Among her best-known novels are "The Bluest Eye," "Song of Solomon," "Beloved," and "A Mercy."

29.title: Intersectionality Matters! Podcast
29.subtitle: Intersectionality Matters! is a podcast hosted by Kimberlé Crenshaw, an American civil rights advocate and a leading scholar of critical race theory.

30.title: Tyre Nichols Memorial Fund
30.subtitle: This fundraiser will help cover the costs of mental health services for Tyre Nichols' parents and  time off from their jobs. Additionally, they want to build a memorial skate park for Tyre, in honor of his love for skating and sunsets.

30.title: Text a bot for book suggestions
30.subtitle: Twitter user @ecmoy created a bot that you can text for recommendations of books written by Black authors based on genre. It will also link you to a Black-owned bookstore that is selling the title. Text (409) 404-0403 to try it!

31.title: Ka'oir Fitness
31.subtitle: Ka'oir Fitness, founded in 2011 by celebrity Keyshia Ka'oir is a fitness line of patented, trademarked fat burners to help people lose weight faster than ever.

products.name: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™
products.description: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™ will have your waist, stomach & back looking amazing. This is a unisex fitness product which burns belly & back fat, sheds excess water and shrinks waist size....all while allowing your abs to be more visible. It allows you to spot train your stomach, back  & waist.

products.name: Ka'oir Body Sweat™
products.description: The Ka'oir Body Sweat is a state of the art "sweat" suit. It is very stretchy, flexible & comfortable for any workout. KA'OIR Body Sweat will make you sweat tremendously, your metabolism will increase, you will burn calories, lose weight & shed water!

products.name: Ka'oir Slimming Tea
products.description: KA’OIR Slimming Tea is a loose leaf tea packed in individual nylon tea bags that contains a powerful blend of natural ingredients to help slim your body! Each package includes 14 bags (78.4 grams) of detox tea, and is meant to be used every day or every other day.

31.title: Reconstruction in America
31.subtitle: Read the Equal Justice Initiative's report on racial violence after the Civil War, from 1865-1876.
